Just before he arrived, I looked at Kelly and said "remember what I said Kelly, and don't tell him anything. I don't want him thinking that if you don't work out that it's because of me"

"No problem Ally" she said. "Maybe you could give me some ideas for dates, or help me get inside his head and figure him out. Maybe you can be my spy" she said with a funny grin on her face, just as the doorbell wrung. She let Aaron in and he joins us with our board game. After a few games, we decided to go for a swim. Kelly and I went to her bedroom, where she gave me the bikini I had used yesterday, and she had grabbed a pair of her older brothers trunks he had left here when she said "Let's see if we can get Aaron to wear a bikini"

"What" I asked, a tad bit confused by what she had said.

"Let's tell Aaron that the only swimsuit that will fit him is one of my bikinis. We don't have to make him really, just tell him is see his reaction. I bet it will be priceless." She explained.

Thinking to myself about how Aaron and I would always pull pranks on each other when we were kids and how as we grew up we slowly stopped, I said "Sure, why not".

With that we found Kelly's most feminine bikini we could find in her closet, ultimately choosing this one ( http://m.kohls.com/kohlsopenapi/productm... ) and brought it to Aaron.

"So Aaron" Kelly started, "we couldn't find a swimsuit for you so..."

"Your gonna have to wear one of Kelly's" I said finishing her sentence as Kelly took the bikini out from behind her back.

"No way" Aaron said, taking a step back. "There's no way I'm gonna wear that"

"Well if you want to swim you don't have a choice" Kelly said. "How's it going to look to my parents if my new boyfriend is walking around their house with no underwear on because he swam in them and they are on the deck drying"

"I don't care wha.." he started. "Did you say boyfriend?"

"Yea, is there a problem with that" Kelly asked.

"No problem, well" he said looking at the bikini Kelly was holding. "If it's my only option I guess"

"Don't worry it's not your only option" I said tossing him the pair of Kelly's brothers swim trunks.

"Not funny" Aaron said.

"No" Kelly said. "It was hilarious. Maybe not for you, but for us"

With that Aaron went to the bathroom to change, and Kelly and I went out to her pool and started swimming. "So" Kelly asked, "have you thought about joining any school teams at all?"

"What" I asked.

"Well you've got a much more, athletic, body than before the accident. So I'll ask again. Ally, have you thought about joining any school teams?"

"Why would I think about doing that" I asked in reply.

"Well look at it this way" Kelly started. "When you were a guy, you liked to check out girls right?" I nodded my head up and down. "Didn't it ever occur to you that most girls, at least the ones with good looking figures, do something to keep in shape. I mean, Sam and I play softball every spring so we have a reason to stay in shape"

"I hear what your saying. But maybe I'll join you guys with softball come spring time" I said, but stopped as Aaron walked outside. "Maybe if I'm on the team Aaron will have no excuse to not go to the games"

"What" he said as he heard his name.

"Allison here is gonna join the softball team next Spring and your gonna be expected at every game" Kelly said.

"You serious Ally" he said as he sat in and inflatable chair in the pool.

"Well yea" I said, paddling over to him. "I gotta keep this figure and it's months away so..." I flipped him out of his chair so had I kept speaking he woulda never heard what I said.

"What was that for" he shouted as he broke the surface of the water.

"You wanted me to include you in what I was doing. This is me including you in my activities" I said with a smile on my face.

We swam for about a hour and a half before we headed inside and dried off. I went to shower and get all the chlorine washed off. Walking downstairs, I saw Aaron and Kelly watching some comedy movie, and there was very little space between them. I was about to go join them when my phone went off. Looking at the caller ID I recognized my dad's phone number and answered the call.

"Allison, listen I've got a problem" he said.

"Hello to you to dad. What's up?" I asked.

"Well" he started, "I'm leaving the office and walk back to my car when I find out that three of my car tires have gone flat and someone crashed into the back of the car. It's gonna be in the shop for a few weeks and I need you to come get me"

"Can't they just give you a rental or something" I asked.

"They're all out but can get me one by Monday morning at the latest. But for now I need you to come get me and drive me home"

"Where are you" I asked.

"I'm at the auto shop on Jefferson and 83rd street" he said.

"That's like two blocks from school right" I asked

"Yes" he answered.

"Ok. I should be there in less than 20 minutes" I told him before hitting end on my phone.

With that I told Kelly and Aaron where I was going and when I should be back, and left.
1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: A talk with Kelly

1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
So I picked my dad up and drove him home. On the way home we talked a little about some things, like how I was adapting and all of that kind of stuff. I told him how I helped set up Kelly and Aaron, making sure to leave out the bit where Kelly and I have feelings for each other. We talked about school, which was when the topic of homecoming came up. It was in two weeks, and Kelly, Sam and I still hadn't gone shopping for dresses. Before that topic got to far we arrived home and I said goodbye to him and drove back to Kelly's. Aaron was getting ready to head home when I got there, and being late Sunday afternoon, Kelly and I didn't really do much for the rest of the day. We did however, discuss what we should do about homecoming dresses, which surprised Kelly a tad bit.

Getting tired, we went to bed around nine o'clock because it was a school night after all. But while lying in my sleeping bag on the floor of Kelly's room I came to a serious realization. I had gym class third hour and I didn't have clean gym clothes. "Hey Kel" I said in the darkness of her room.

"What's up?" She asked in reply.

"I'm just realizing that I didn't pack any clean gym clothes for class Monday" I said.

Turning on the reading light next to her bed she said "no problem. Just use some of my stuff" getting out of bed and walking to her closet she pulled some clothes out and said "here"

Getting up to look at them, she handed me a pair of purple running tights that went down to just above my ankles, a black under armor shirt, and a black sports bra. "Need anything else" she asked.

"Well" I started. "I did leave my running shoes at home"

"Ok" she said and picked up a pair of black and white Nike's. "These should fit fine"

"Thanks" I sad. And with that I fell asleep until Kelly's alarm went off Monday morning.

Monday itself went by rather uneventfully. During gym class we played tennis outside and I ended up taking my shirt off. I felt weird at first, but I eventually got over it because it lead to me winning a few matches.

The days real excitement came after school. I was scheduled to go to the hospital for a check-up so they could make sure everything was fine. I got a feeling however that everything wasn't fine when after they ran all the tests they said they were going to run the doctors didn't come back into the examination room for almost half an hour. Dad was getting frustrated and was about to go see what was takeing so long when two doctors entered the room, a man and a woman.

"Allison" the man said. "I'm Dr. John Clark". Gesturing to the female doctor, he said "This is my associate Dr. Autumn White. I'm afraid we have some bad news"

"What" I asked.

"Well" Dr. White started. "It seems that the hormone shots you were given to turn you into a girl were stronger than we initially anticipated"

"What do you mean" dad asked.

"Well" Dr. White started, "it would seem that they are turning you into a 100% 16 year old girl."

"Aren't they suppost to do that?" I asked.

"No" Dr. Clark said. "They are only suppose to make you look like a girl. It would seem that the hormones have started to create a female reproductive system inside of you"

Shocked, I practically screamed "can you stop it"

"Based on our tests there is nothing we can do that wouldn't require surgery" Dr. White said. "And even then, it would just happen again. We would like to have you stay here as a precaution, but mostly so we can make sure that it is fully finished without causing you to much pain"

"When will the process be completed" dad asked.

"We figure two days at the latest, but as soon as tomorrow afternoon" Dr. Clark said.

"Will there be any side affects?" I asked.

"Yes" Dr. White said "You'll get the monthly visitor all girls get. The hospital will be sending a nurse to help you get thought your first few periods. There may also be some mental effects though"

"Like what" I asked, getting scared.

"Simple put, you'll start thinking like a girl. You may be more prone to showing off your body or start liking attention you get from boys and even possibly start liking boys yourself"

"So what now" I asked

"We'll check you into a room like the one you woke up in and have sedatives ready if the changes are painful" Dr. Clark said. "Once the changes are completed we'll make sure your 100% healthy and you can go home"

With that they brought me to a room almost exactly the same as the one I was in after weakening up from my coma. Nothing really happened while I was there during the day. I was aloud to leave my room and talk with other people in the recovery rooms. I mostly talked to older people who's family was either to busy or lived to far away to visit them. However, there was one person my own age there. Her name was Amy, and she was in the hospital because she broke her leg playing softball and then it didn't heal right. She went to a school a few miles outta town, basically a rival school. We talked a little about our schools, but we mostly talked about sports. She was all around a nice person and we talked until I had to go to my own room for bed. Just before I left Amy said "It was nice to meet you Allison, your the first person outside of my family I've talked to in weeks". That made me feel good inside.

I didn't sleep easy that night. And my dream was really weird. Most nights when I'd have a dream it was like something that happened during the day or something that was on my mind. But tonight, I was shopping with Sam and Kelly for homecoming dresses and I was all in. Like, I was looking at buying a really girly dress and high heels and all that stuff. When I finally woke up the sun was shinning through the window and there was a nurse in my room holding a clipboard. "Good morning sleepy head" she said.

"Wha" I said in a very groggy tone.

"Well, I come with good and bad news" she said, "What do you want first?"

"I hate this" I said, "give me the bad news first"

"It seems your change happened even faster than we predicted at first. As of last night you became 100% girl, both inside and out"

"And the bad news" I asked.

"You should be able to leave after a few exams today to be sure your in good health. I predict around 2:30ish" she said, setting the clipboard down on a small table in the room. "Doctors Clark and White will be here soon to administer the tests and while we are waiting for the results we will be letting your father know he can come pick you up"

"Doesn't he have to be here before you can do the tests" I asked.

"Normally, yes. But he gave us written permission to do the tests without him present because he needed to be working today"

"Ok" I said, "when do we start"

"After you've had breakfast"

So once I'd eaten a plate of eggs and some toast with peanut butter on it we got down to the tests. I tried to stay as calm as I could, which was hard because Dr. White was examining a newly formed vagina which I wasn't even supposed to have in the first place. The tests went on for about two and a half hours, and the hospital called my dad around one o'clock to say they were waiting for results on the tests and he could come to pick me up. He showed up around 1:30 and we waited together for about ten minutes before Dr. Clark entered the room. "Allison, from everything we can tell you are now a fully healthy teenage girl. You free to go but we do ask that you continue coming back around every mouth or so for about four or five mouths".

"Can do doc" I said as I got up to leave with dad.
1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: Picking up dad

1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
Dinner was, awkward, to say the least. Dad and I had to go through the process of explaining everything that the doctors had told us. Needless to say, he was just as shocked as we were. Especially because this little accident would take even more of the little bit of me that was essentially still me. The rest of dinner was more or less an awkward silence as everyone continued to process everything. But eventually we all finished our meals, and I volunteered to do the dishes. As I placed the dishes in the sink and turned the water on, I heard someone approach behind me. I turned around to see Aaron standing there, clearly unsure about what to say. "What's up bro" I asked.

"Just trying to process this is all" he replied.

"Listen, the doctors basically said that any mental changes were a definite maybe, not a sure thing. There's a chance that all that comes from this is I will be able to push a baby outta myself way down the road"

"But what if more than just that happens?"

"Listen, I'm still the same right now. And I trust that no matter what happens to me your still going to be my younger brother that I'll always love and care for"

Before I knew it, Aaron had his arms wrapped around me giving me a big hug. "Thanks Ally, I think I needed that"

The rest of the night went by rather quickly and uneventfully. I finished all my homework and was in bed around 9:30 or so. Then the next morning came. I woke up early like always and took a quick shower before getting ready for school. Once I had dried off and gotten dressed I went downstairs and threw together a bowl of cereal for breakfast. Then Aaron and I went to school. Aaron went and joined his friends, while I went to find mine. I found Patrick and Eric first and decided I'd catch up with them. "Hey guys, what's up" I asked.

"Oh, hey Ally" Eric said as he noticed me first. "Not much. How about you"

"Oh, same old same old I guess" I lied, not wanting to tell them yet about my doctors visit quite yet.

"So, where were you yesterday" Patrick asked.

"Hospital, the doctors thought there was a strange result from one of the tests they ran from my monthly check and wanted to hold my for a day just to be safe" I said. While it was partly true, I didn't want to worry them by telling them the whole truth.

"Are you ok?" Patrick asked, clearly worried.

"I'm here, aren't I?"

"Yeah, come on Pat. They wouldn't let her come to school today if something was wrong with her"

"I guess" Patrick said, but I had a feeling he knew something was up.

The three of us continued talking until we were joined by Kelly and Sam. Then the talk turned to a date Sam and Eric were planning for this weekend. Before I knew it the bell was ringing and Patrick and Eric went their separate ways while Kelly, Sam and I all went to our first class. But not before making plans to all eat lunch together.
1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: Talking with Aaron later on

1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
My first class wasn't anything special, and neither were any of the other classes before lunch. I met up with Kelly and Sam sense they were in classes not far from mine, and we walked together to the cafeteria to meet up with Patrick and Eric. The 3 of us got a table, and I stayed behind because I had brought my own lunch today while Kelly and Sam went to go get a school lunch.

I wasn't alone for more than 2 minutes before someone behind me asked "Is this seat taken"

I turned around to see a boy my age standing there, brown hair and blue eyes. He was probably 6 feet even and 170 pounds. I didn't recognize him, but it was a big school. "Not at the moment" I replied.

He took a seat next to me and said "Thanks"

"No problem"

"My names Michael Evans" he said as he stuck his hand out.

"Allison" I replied as I shook his hand. "You new here?"

"Yeah. My dads in the Navy and he just got orders to the naval support facility up in Saratoga Springs"

"So, what are you doing here. They've got their own school over there"

"Our new house is about halfway between the 2, and from what my parents could tell this school is better. A couple of school of choice forms later and me and my twin sister are going to school here"

I nodded my head a tad in acknowledgment, then asked "So, where were you guys living before you came here?"

"Most recently Pearl Harbor. Before that Portsmouth in Maine and Newport Rohde Island the time before that"

"Dang, must have been hard to leave Hawaii"

"Yeah, but we'll get over it. It's not like we're not used to living in this part of the country"

The two of us talked for a minute before my friends started showing up. It seemed like for the most part everyone really liked Michael. About halfway through lunch his twin sister, Rebecca joined us. She, like her brother, was a pretty cool person. The 8 of us talked all the way up to the bell that signaled that lunch was over and we needed to go to class. Surprisingly, Rebecca had the same schedule as me after lunch. We had just arrived and taken our seats when Amber walked up. "How's it going, freak" she said, clearly addressing me.

"What do you want Amber?"

"I just saw you hanging out with the new girl me though I'd save her from hanging out with a freak like you and offer to personally show her around"

"Um, the new girls got a name" Rebecca said.

"And I'm sure I'll learn it in due time. But for now why don't you just come with me and we can leave this freak alone"

"How bout not. I've literally know. You for a minute and I can already tell your a world class bitch.

Rolling her eyes, Amber said "Whatever. See if I care" before storming off to her own seat and friends.

"What's her problem. It's almost like she's out to get you or something" Rebecca asked.

"It's kinda hard to explain. And I've grown used to it"

"Mind telling me the story"

I thought for about it for a second. "After school, it's kinda hard to explain"

The rest of school went by without any other incidents. And before I knew it, Rebecca and I were waiting for our brothers by the student parking lot. "Ok Allison, you told me that you'd explain why that Amber chick hates you so much after school. It's after school now"

"One second" I said as I waved over to Aaron who was searching through the crowd for me. Once he got to where we were standing, I introduced him to Rebecca. "Ok, so Amber"

"Yeah, what's her deal"

"Oh no" Aaron said. "What did she do now"

"Nothing new" I replied to him. Turning back to Rebecca, I said "Almost 8 months ago now, I got hit by a truck while playing basketball with Aaron, Patrick, and Eric. The ball went into the road and I got hit by a truck"

"She hates you because of that?" She asked with a quizzical look on her face.

"No, she hates me because of what happened while I was there. You see, Allison Samuels didn't even exist when I was admitted to the hospital. I was admitted as Brian Samuels You see, my entire pelvic region was crushed and I required a lot of surgery and these experimental hormone shots so that I could live a normal life. Amber believes that because I was a boy that became a girl that I'm some sorta freak that should be avoided at all costs"

Rebecca was silent for a moment as she processed everything. "Oh, my, gosh. I can believe anyone would treat you that way for something you've got no control over"

That was when Michael found us. I proceeded to tell him what I had told his sister and he had more or less the same reaction, except for the fact that he did t know about Amber.

"Hey Becca, I just got a text from mom. She wants us home ASAP so we can help with unpacking the boxes that arrived today. See you two tomorrow" Michael said.

"Ok" she said acknowledging him, before turning back to me. "Hey, listen, I don't have much in the way of fall or winter clothes. Would you be interested in going to the mall with tomorrow so I can pick up some stuff"

"Sure. I'll run it by Sam and Kelly and see if they wanna come with"

"Sure, I love shopping with groups more"

"Becca" Michael shouted as he continued to walk to their car.

"Coming" she shouted back at him. "See you guys tomorrow"

"See ya" I replied.

I stood there with Aaron for a second in silence before he said "You shoulda gotten hit by a truck years ago. 2 months after waking up and you've already tripled how many hot girls you have as friends"

"Carful baby brother. Your already dating one of those friends"
1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: Later at lunch

1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
The rest of the day was rather uneventful. I went straight to my room when we got home and began knocking out my homework after texting Kelly and Sam to see if they wanted to go to the mall with Rebecca and me (which they both quickly replied that they'd love to go) while Aaron spent most of his afternoon watching tv and Skyping his friends. Dad got home around 6:30 or so and made chicken breasts for dinner. The three of us talked about our days, I told dad about Rebecca and Michael, and how I was planning to go to the mall with Kelly Sam and Rebecca. After dinner, I went upstairs and took a quick shower before heading to my room and watched a movie until I decided to go to bed.

The next day I woke up to my alarm and went through my morning routine. After going to the bathroom I went downstairs for some breakfast. As I walked into the kitchen I saw my dad already dressed for work, drinking a cup of coffee and reading the paper. "Morning dad" I said as I wiped the sleep from my eyes.

"Morning Ally"

"What are you doing up so early?"

"Oh, I just have an early meeting today"

"Oh. Is it important" I asked as I got a bowl of cereal and sat next to him.

"Not really. My bosses just want a more detailed report of what's been going on"

"Ok, well, good luck with that"

"Thanks sweetie" he replied as he pulled me in and kissed my forehead.
I decided to let it go sense I was starting to get used to being treated like a girl. Even at home.

The two of us sat in silence for a minute before I said "hey dad, could I have some money for after school. I'm willing to bet Kelly and Sam are gonna try and get me to buy something at the mall"

"Sure" he said as he pulled out his wallet. "Here, take my debit card. Just promise me that you won't go crazy with it"

"I promise" I answered as I took the card. Dad sat at the table with me until I finished my breakfast before he left for work. As he went out to the garage, I headed back upstairs to get dressed for the day. As I stripped out of the clothes I had worn last night to sleep in and put a clean bra and pantie set on. Then I stood in front of my open closet for a minute before I picked out a pair of jeans, a grey New England Patriots shirt and a light blue hoodie. Then I grabbed my backpack and went back downstairs, where I saw Aaron eating his own breakfast, already dressed and ready for school. We talked for a bit while he finished eating, then we both went to my car and left for school.

I met up with Kelly and Sam before class and Sam told us about her hectic day at work yesterday. As we were talking Rebecca eventually joined us, but right before the bell signaling it was time to go to class went off and we all went off our separate ways for now.

The first half of the day was rather boring and tedious, but eventually lunch came around and I met up with everyone. As we ate, Rebecca began asking about the homecoming dance in a few days. We told her how Kelly was going with Aaron, Sam with Eric, and me with Pat. Rebecca, not wanting to be left out, decided that she'd go to even though she didn't have a date. But seeing as she didn't have a dress yet, Kelly suggested that we put that on a list of things we look for.

The rest of the day after lunch was just as uneventful as the first half. But soon enough the time came and the four of us were in my car headed to the mall. As we were walking in, Rebecca said "So, where do you suggest we start?"

"Well" Kelly started. "We got Ally's dress from JC Penny's. That's probably a pretty good place to start looking"

"Let's go then" Rebecca said enthusiastically. The four of us quickly walked to penny's and began our search for Rebecca's dress. After a few minutes of browsing, Rebecca approached me and said "Hey, Ally, what does your dress look like?"

I looked around at the various around me, before saying "it's actually this one right here" and pulled an identical dress to the one I bought with Kelly and same off a rack ( http://s7d9.scene7.com/is/image/JCPenney...$product_pdp$ ).

"Oh my gosh, I bet that looks great on you" she said as she looked it over. "What kinda shoes are you wearing with it?"

"You know, I don't think we ever bought any when I got the dress"

"Bought any what?" Kelly asked as she approached us.

"Ally says when you three came here and got her dress you didn't buy any shoes to go with it"

"Oh my gosh" Kelly said as she placed her hands over her mouth. "I can't believe we forgot about some shoes"

"Kelly, why don't you take Ally and go look for some shoes and Sam and I will meet you over there in a little bit"

"Ok, let's go Ally" Kelly said as she grabbed my hand and pulled me with her. I barely had time to put the dress back on the rack.

Before I knew it, Kelly had led me back to where all the shoes were. And more specifically, high heels. "Ok Ally" Kelly said as we walked into the shoe section. "We gotta find you a pair of heels that'll go good with your dress"

"Why do they have to be heels?"

"Because it's just what girls do for dances. Don't worry, a lot of people take them off for a majority of the dance anyway"

"Fine" I said giving in.

The two of us wandered around looking at shoes for a few solid minutes, with Kelly occasionally having me try on a pair she'd found. While I have to admit they weren't as bad as I would've thought, I couldn't let Kelly know that. After taking off the most recent pair she had me try on, something caught my eye. It was black with a crisscrossing pattern that would go over the top of my foot, stopped below the ankle, and had a short zipper on the back ( http://s7d9.scene7.com/is/image/JCPenney...$product_pdp$ ). As I picked it up and examined it, Kelly walked up behind me and said "That's perfect. You totally have to try those"

Setting the display shoe down, I found a pair in my size and was about to try them on when Rebecca and Sam walked up to us. "Hey guys" I said as I saw them. "Find a good one?"

"Yeah" Rebecca said showing us what she had picked out.

"And on the way over here I noticed a pair of skinny jeans on a clearance rack that I liked. But they didn't have my size but they had yours Ally so I thought I'd come show them to you" Sam added.

"Come on Sam. I thought we were here for Rebecca" I said, trying to get out of wearing the jeans in Sam's hands.

"Hey, you could use some more clothes to. You have like four pairs of jeans and they're all basically the same. These can add some variety to your wardrobe"

"She's got a point Ally" Kelly added. "Why don't you take the shoes to the changing room to and try them both on and come back here. That way you can get a better feel for if you like them or not"

As I approached the changing room with jeans and shoe box in hand, I couldn't shake this feeling from the back of my head. The thought that wearing these jeans would be like me taking yet another step away from Brian and towards fully appreciating that I am Allison from now on. I took a deep breath as I opened the door, stepped in, and locked the changing room door. I slowly untied my shoes and took them off, followed by quickly sliding my jeans off. Turning my attention to the skinny jeans, I carefully took them off the hanger and began to put them on, having to do almost a little dance to get them up over my butt. As I buttoned them, I looked in the mirror. As part of my mind screamed that this felt so wrong, another part though that the girl in the mirror looked good in these jeans. Knowing what I needed to do next, I proceeded to slip the heels on. As I stood up, I couldn't deny the fact that these weren't as uncomfortable as I previously thought. I unlocked the door and stepped out of the changing room only to see Kelly, Sam, and Rebecca standing outside waiting for me. I looked at them for a second, before asking "So, what do you guys think?"

"I'm seriously wishing they had those in my size" Sam said.

"Yeah" Kelly added. "Those both look really good on you"

"You should totally get those" Rebecca said.

"You think?" I asked.

"Definitely" Rebecca answered. "Those shoes will look great with your dress"

"And you gotta have some skinny jeans" Kelly added. "They just add so many more outfit options"

The three of them continued to complement me about how the jeans and shoes looked on me for another minute or two before I finally relented and said I'd buy them. After I changed out of the jeans we wondered around the stood for a few more minutes before deciding to pay for what we had and move on. Then, Kelly wanted to go and check out Macy's. Walking in, we began wondering like we had been at Penny's, pulling various articles off racks and looking them over. There were a couple of shirts that I liked, and even a pair of black leggings. Eventually we ended up in the back half of the store, where all the shoes were, and Kelly and Rebecca had a field day while trying on almost everything in their size. Sam and I would occasionally look at one pair or another, but there wasn't much catching our eye.

"Ally" Kelly said approaching me with another pair of shoes she was trying on. "Go put the jeans you got at JC Penny's on"

"What? Why"

"Because, I just to see you in something"

"What is it?"

"A surprise, ok. Just please do this"

"Fine" I said and went to put on my new skinny jeans.
1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: Tomorrow

1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
I quickly made my way to the changing rooms and stepped into a stall, where I quickly changed into the jeans I had already bought. Figuring Kelly wanted me to try on a pair of shoes, I put my shoes I had been wearing in the bag from JC Penny's along with the jeans I had been wearing. I was about to open the door and walk out when I saw the tags out of the corner of my eye and removed it. Then, I quickly walked over to my friends. While most everyone probably just saw a teenage girl walking around the store in skinny jeans sweatshirt and without her shoes, I felt like I was walking around as someone else. Which I kinda was in a way. As I rejoined the group, Kelly approached and handed me a shoe box that contained what she wanted me to try on. I opened the box, only to have to give Kelly a dirty look as she wanted me to try on a pair of boots with a somewhat sizable heel ( http://slimages.macys.com/is/image/MCY/p...$filterlrg$ ). "I'm not wearing these"

"Just please try them on. You don't have to buy them, unless you like them. I just thought that they'd look really good on you and I wanna see if I'm right"

I took a deep sigh as I thought about it. After a second, I said "Fine. But I'm only trying these on because your both my friend and my brothers girlfriend"

I sat down and proceeded to put them on. Once they were both all tied up I stood up as Kelly looked at them. "They look good, but can you fold the bottom of the legs up"

"What"

"Fold the bottom of the legs up so they aren't in the bootie and you have a little sliver of skin between the two". I looked at her for a moment as I tried to decipher what Kelly's end goal was here. All the while, Sam and Rebecca knew exactly what Kelly was doing. "Please" she begged. Giving in, I began to fold the bottom of the jeans over like Kelly had asked. Once I was done with that she took me over to a mirror. "What do you think"

"I'm not sure" I replied.

"Don't think about you wearing them" she said. "Just look at the knees and below. Does the guy part of your mind like what it sees"

I took in the mirrors reflection for a moment, before answering "I do like it a little"

"Ok. Now when you walked over here what did you think"

"Well, it felt a little weird. I mean I've never worn heels before"

"Ok, but were they comfortable"

I looked down and shifted my weight from one foot to the other and back, then looked at Kelly and said "I guess they are kinda comfortable"

"That's all I wanted to hear" she said. "You can go take them off now"

I sat back down and proceeded to take the booties off as Kelly and Rebecca went back to browsing the shoes. As I was putting them back in the box, Sam sat down next to me and said "she did the same thing to me when we first met"

"What do you mean"

"Kelly opening your mind" Sam answered. "Before I met her I was more or less like you. I dressed in a lot of loser fitting clothes and only wore tennis shoes. Then when I met Kelly in middle school we came here and she did almost the same thing to me. She got me to admit that it wasn't as bad as I made it out to be. And look at me now." Looking over at her, I had to admit she was right. "And I can tell it's having the same effect on you"

"I'm just worried about what Aaron will say. He still looks at me as his brother"

"He always will see you that way. Nothing will change that. Even when your in your cousins wedding, standing there in a bridesmaids dress, he's still gonna see his big brother. But you cant let your worries about him interfere with you embracing your own life"

Cracking a smile, I said "Why are you guys doing this to me"

"Doing what?"

"Getting me to embrace this crap hand I got dealt"

"Because we're your friends Ally. And as bad as things have been, think about all the good things that have come from it. You've got new friends who are always here for you, your brother finally went on a date with his crush, and one of your best friends is dating a girl how probably would never have talked with him"

"Yeah, I guess your right" I said. I looked at the shoes Kelly had me try moments ago for a second. "I think I'm gonna buy these"

The four of us continued looking through the shoes for a little while longer after I had changed back into my original jeans and put my own shoes back on until Kelly and Rebecca pretty much tried everything on. Then we moved on through the rest of the store. As we browsed the rest of the store, something caught my eye. We were looking though some jackets and I pulled one off the rack. As I examined it, I noted that it was basically a green (sage according to the tag) vest put together with a grey sweatshirts sleeves and hood ( http://slimages.macys.com/is/image/MCY/p...$filterlrg$ ). I took the sweatshirt I was wearing off and put this jacket on, checking to see if Kelly or Sam was watching. They weren't, they were to busy with something Kelly found. As I finished putting the jacket on, I heard Rebecca say from behind me "you like that?"

Spinning around, startled that she saw me trying this on, I replied "Actually, I do"

"It looks good on you"

I looked down at the jacket again, then back at Rebecca. "This is so weird"

"What"

"Yesterday I would have looked at this at best. Kelly does her mind game and all of a sudden I'm buying a pair of heeled boots and I'm looking at this jacket thinking about buying it to"

"Listen, I can't imagine to start to understand what's going through your head. But it sounds to me your friends got you to accept what's happened to you. And it seems like you've taken a big step forward"

Rebecca and I continued to talk while the four of us continued browsing the rest of the store. In the end, everyone ended up buying some stuff. As for myself, I bought 3 shirts, a pair of leggings, the shoes and the jacket. We then all headed to the food court where we got some snacks and just enjoyed the rest of our afternoon before we left the mall. Arriving back at school, I dropped off Kelly and Sam at Sam's car while I drove Rebecca to her house. Once I dropped her off, I made the trek back to my house.

He can’t come to the phone now, but I can ensure you its’ quite urgent. Thank you sir, we’ll see you and Ms Sullivan when you get here. Sorry to interrupt your night!” concluded Kelly as she stopped the call.

As awkward as it was hearing the exchange between David Sullivan and Kelly about me, I could see how distressed Patrick looked. Brianna held her tight as Kelly motioned me away. “This needs to be about Patrick and Brianna! It’s obvious she doesn’t care what Patrick looks like, she clearly likes her from her personality! This girl was so wonderful.
